text:
National Association of Educational Broadcasters
1340 CONNECTICUT AVENUE
WASHINGTON, X). C. 20030
HAROLD E. HILL VICE PRESIDENT
January 29, 1965
Mrs. Marion Corwell
Associate Director
School Relations
Dearborn Public Schools
4824 Lois
Dearborn, Michigan 48126
Dear Marion:
We have not really abandoned all thought of a speakers guide â€”
we merely wanted to report to you and Lee some of our thoughts.
Lee and I have already set up an appointment for Feburary 9 when
he will be in Washington. At that time, Lee and I and Jim Fellows
will discuss this whole matter in greater detail.
We still feel there is a great need for such a guide but want
to be sure we can overcome the problems I pointed out in my letter
of January 22. Lee and I, or both of us, will advise you of our
discussion.
HEH/mlm
